pages.text: A big machine, which produces $(l:tools/fuel_canister)Fuel$() from:$(#0E0D0D)$(list1)Coal$() $(#009b94)$(list1)Morkite$() $(#009b94)$(list1)Liquid Morkite$() $(#141330)$(list1)Oil Shale$()

$(l)How to use the Refinery$() $(br)$(list2)1. Put your items into the slots, which are meant to be processed$() $(br)$(list2)2. Press the Refine Button, the refinery will know the right amount to refine$() $(br)$(list2)3. Insert the fuel canister item into the slot under the tank$() $(br)$(list2)4. Press Refill to refill the tank, the refinery will calculate the right amount to fill in$().
